Articles.Content:
The killing hill is killing everybody trying to possess the hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-29T14:55:04Z" title="07/29/2018 02:55  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 29, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
Except me. My hill.
Yes, except you, because you are still in Aperture Science's vivarium.
No i am not. my hill.

/kill killinghill

/give @s grass\_block 64

/give @s dirt 63

I make a hill for me and my Pokémon. My hill.
I eat you. My hill.

/tp 9 120 30 (which are my hill's coordinates)

I teleport out and reclaim my hill.
I make a new hill and set it at coordinates 0 N, 0 E on my planet and set up a space elevator, a circumplanetary shield, and a space station. My Plernert.

An assistant bot gets to your cell and drops a piece of sugar as a prize.

GLaDOS is going to provide you with a larger room if you keep working hard.

I wheel a cart with a small hill of cake past Minmus Derp's cell.

My cake-hill.
I am not in a cell. My plernert. (as stated above)

I decide to live in the space station and happily become one of [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/)'s <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">subjects. I like this place!</font>

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">I also happily become one of your engineers (despite being bluesuit-inexperienced)</font>
I train you to become really good at it. My plernert with spaceships (one for [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/))
Our planet/plernert with spaceships.

GLaDOS floods the hill with neurotoxin. GLaDOS’ hill.

I murder GLaDOS by taking her personality cores. My hill.
I am impervious to neurotoxin. I take the hill with my special key to the shield gate. Me and [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)'s hill.
Also, I don't know what GLaDOS is.
Neither do I. Wait... [@GLaDOS](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/8090-glados/) That's who it is.
<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">Oh. Still.</font>

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> I don't know what GLaDOS is.
> 

She knows you, and that's enough.

> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> I am not in a cell.
> 

GLaDOS just realized this and switches all portals to "back into your rack" mode.  

You will soon get captured.

> 
> 
> 29 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> You
> 

\*we

This world does not have Portal.

See?

Spoiler

Portal = no

> 
> 
> 7 minutes ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> See?
> 
> 
> 
> Hide contents
> 
> 
> Portal = no
> 

What makes you think that you are editing a correct config file?

It's just a copy.
[@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/)'s and my hill!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
There are no portals. done. [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) and My Hill!!!!!!
**<u>AND THERE WAS PEACE ON PLANET HILL</u>**
